title: Pixel 4a bricked by using flash-all.bat in https://developers.google.com/android/images?hl=en#legal
content:
My device is boot loader unlocked.

I was using the flash-all.bat in Factory Images for Nexus and Pixel Devices  |  Google APIs for Android
but unfortunately I flashed the pixel 4a image to my pixel 4a 5g ..... didn't realize they are completely different phones with different image...


Now, my phone has a black screen and I cant get into fastboot mode by holding down power and vol Down for 60 seconds.

I just got the phone in Xmas.... am I out of luck??
This is super confusing that pixel 4a and pixel 4a (5g) uses different image... Doesn't the tool have any fail safe?


This was the output.
